BookOfTails.name: BOOK OF TAILS
BookOfTails.description: At start of turn, add a <c=cardtrait>temp</c> <c=card>Fox Tale</c> to your hand.

FramjificentCore.name: FramjificentCore
FramjificentCore.description: Draw a card whenever you <c=cardtrait>exhaust</c> a card

description.None: Immediately after drawing add 1 <c=status>Corrode<c/> to the enemy and exhaust this card.
description.A: Immediately after drawing add 1 <c=status>Corrode<c/> to the enemy and exhaust this card.
description.B: Immediately after drawing add 1 <c=status>Corrode<c/> to the enemy and exhaust this card.

description.None: Add 2 <c=card>Fetor</c> to your Draw pile, and one <c=card>Pestilence</c> to your Discard.
description.A: Add 2 <c=card>Fetor</c> to your Draw pile, and one <c=card>Pestilence</c> to your Discard.
description.B: Add 3 <c=card>Fetor</c> to your Draw pile, and 2 <c=card>Pestilence</c> to your Discard.
